long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension will update your search settings and will change your new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing.

Elevate your typing skills with TypingTutor – a blend of fun and interactive learning! 
Every new tab opens a door to enhancing your typing skills. 
Just type in the given text, and watch TypingTutor meticulously analyze your progress and maintain your score. 
Get ready to transform each tap into a step toward becoming a typing master.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Typing Tutor extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
 
Uninstall Instructions: https://www.gettypingtutor.com/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.gettypingtutor.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://www.gettypingtutor.com/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.gettypingtutor.com/terms.html#terms-contact
About Us : https://www.gettypingtutor.com/about.html

In today's fast-paced world, where efficient communication is paramount, typing speed is a valuable skill. ‘Typing Tutor’ Chrome Extension is your gateway to achieving lightning-fast typing prowess right from your browser. 

‘Typing Tutor’ focuses solely on enhancing your typing speed and is dedicated to one goal: making you a faster typist. Practice with customized lessons ,track and monitor your progress seamlessly in your browser.

No more dealing with the frustration of slow typing. With this extension by your side, you'll bid adieu to sluggish keystrokes and usher in a new era of heightened productivity. Your path to becoming a typing virtuoso starts here, making every word you type a testament to your newfound prowess. Say goodbye to slow typing and hello to increased productivity!

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
